drupalNodeEvent.title: Rural returns and ritualized commensality during the Lunar New Year: Restoration or transformation of moral communities

field_description.processed:
Let's check out Prof. Ellen Oxfeld upcoming webinar at 9:00am, on Mar 14 (Monday). The topic is Rural returns and ritualized commensality during the Lunar New Year: Restoration or transformation of moral communities. She is going to share about the moral dimensions of return at Chinese village. It is conducted in English.

Due to the new social distancing measures introduced by the Hong Kong government, the webinar will conduct online.

Speaker: Prof. Ellen Oxfeld

Date: Mar 14, 2022

Time: 9:00-10:30 am (HKT)

Registration link: https://cloud.itsc.cuhk.edu.hk/mycuform/view.php?id=1496812
